attractions.name: Bisti/De-Na-Zin Wilderness
attractions.description: A remote area featuring unique rock formations, hoodoos, and badlands, ideal for hiking and photography.

attractions.name: Shiprock Pinnacle
attractions.description: A sacred monadnock rising nearly 1,600 feet above the high-desert plain, significant in Navajo culture.

attractions.name: Chaco Culture National Historical Park
attractions.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site preserving ancient Puebloan ruins and kivas, offering insights into pre-Columbian history.

attractions.name: Bolack Museum of Fish and Wildlife
attractions.description: A museum featuring an extensive collection of taxidermy animals from around the world, showcasing wildlife conservation efforts.

attractions.name: Riverview Golf Course
attractions.description: An 18-hole golf course with scenic views, suitable for golfers of all skill levels.

attractions.name: Animas River Walk
attractions.description: A scenic riverside trail perfect for walking, biking, and enjoying nature along the Animas River.

attractions.name: Mountain Waters Rafting
attractions.description: Offers white-water rafting adventures on the Animas River, suitable for families and thrill-seekers.

attractions.name: Aztec Ruins National Monument
attractions.description: Preserves ancestral Puebloan structures, including a reconstructed Great Kiva.

attractions.name: Salmon Ruins Museum
attractions.description: Features archaeological sites and exhibits related to the ancient Chacoan and Pueblo cultures.

attractions.name: Farmington Museum at Gateway Park
attractions.description: Offers exhibits on regional history, culture, and art, including traveling exhibitions.
